summary.span: 定义 Microsoft UI 自动化基础结构的支持类型。

span.span: Defines the support types for Microsoft UI Automation infrastructure.

summary.span: 这些支持类型用于实现 Microsoft UI 自动化对自定义控件的支持。

span.span: These support types are for implementing Microsoft UI Automation support for a custom control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档包含仅.NET 投影的投影的 WinRT 类型与不同的 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间类型的完整列表，请参阅[Windows.UI.Xaml.Automation](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.automation) UWP API 参考。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Automation](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.automation) in the UWP API reference.
